EmailTemplate.name: NCS Ambassador May 2016 Opportunities
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Ambassadors - fresh new opportunities!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
As one of our valued NCS Ambassadors, we just wanted to let you know about some amazing opportunities you can still get involved in!
1. NCS Ambassador Phone Party:
Get trained on top customer service tips Get on the phone to upcoming NCS 2016 participants Use your experience to get them excited for the summer! Help yourself earn a TCS Award! [LINK TO TCS AWARDS PAGE ON LOCAL WEBSITE]
The Phone Party will be happening during the next half-term on [DATE] from [TIMES] in [GENERAL AREA]. If you're interested, fill in this form [LINK TO GOOGLE FORM] and we'll give you a call to discuss it further.
2. NCS 2016 Information Evenings:
Share you NCS experience with the parents/guardians of upcoming 2016 participants Let them know all about your time on the programme and what their young person can expect Help yourself earn a TCS Award! [LINK TO TCS AWARDS PAGE ON LOCAL WEBSITE]
Information Evenings take place on a regular basis throughout the summer. If you're interested in attending one or more as an NCS Ambassador, email [SALES NCS AMBASSADOR LEAD EMAIL] for more information.
Thanks to everyone who has helped spread the word of NCS already this year. We hope to see you again soon!
The Challenge Society
